GHR,Donnai-Barrow syndrome
How many people are affected by Donnai-Barrow syndrome ?,"Although its prevalence is unknown, Donnai-Barrow syndrome appears to be a rare disorder. A few dozen affected individuals have been reported in many regions of the world.",GHR,Donnai-Barrow syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Donnai-Barrow syndrome ?,"Mutations in the LRP2 gene cause Donnai-Barrow syndrome. The LRP2 gene provides instructions for making a protein called megalin, which functions as
